name: *RESERVED FOR ROSEMARY* A Hearts Flight Necklace
description:
Fly away with this necklace, made with a pair of crystal encrusted wings and a reclaimed black enamelled heart with pearl drop and tiny padlock charm.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Falling Leaves Necklace
description:
On a vintage pocket watch plates its a reclaimed gem encrusted butterfly surrounded by falling purple shell leaves that haven't realised that its not yet autumn!
With the butterfly is a reclaimed silver marcasite flower.

This pendant is hung from a long chain which can be fastened anywhere along its length to suit.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Locket Up In your Heart Necklace
description:
Here is a little brass locket for something precious paired with an ornate antique brass tone frame with an opal effect cabochon.

This pendant is hung from a long chain which can be fastened anywhere along its length to suit.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: What's The Buzz Necklace
description:
Hand painted little bee is happy the see the recycled flower set in the frame above.

This pendant is hung from a long chain which can be fastened anywhere along its length to suit.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: By The Light Of The Moon Necklace
description:
On a night of the purple moon a tiny owl sat ahead of a sky of shimmering grey.

Pendant hangs on a silver plate chain and Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Eye Don't Know What You Are Looking At Necklace
description:
Multi Coloured glass eye cabochon set on a silver plated frame and chain. the backing in the frame is handpainted in pinks and purples.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Behind the Mask Necklace
description:
I found a little frame with three masks and this is the first one I have used.
It is set on a handpainted frame pendant and hangs from a silver plated chain.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: For The One Eye Love Pendant
description:
Glass eye cabochon set on a reclaimed heart shaped and gem encrusted pendant and hung from a silver plated chain.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: The Totem Owls
description:
These large brass owls have been hand painted by me and remind me of the owls you find atop a totem pole.

The two pendants pictured are in stock right away and other colour combinations are available but will take an extra few days as I need to let the paints dry properly.

Chain is long but can be fastened anywhere along its length to suit.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: The Sun, Moon and Stars Pendant
description:
Ever wanted the Sun, Moon and Stars? Now they can all be yours on this pendant!

Set upon a brass pocket watch back plate with hand painted blue details, the Sun is made from a hand painted glass cabochon on a gear charm, the Moon is cut from a disc of brass and the stars are in three different shades of Swarovski crystal.

Chain is long but can be fastened anywhere along its length to suit.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Fly Me To The Moon Pendant
description:
Based upon a brass pocket watch back plate with hand painted details, the plane flies through a Swarovski starry sky under a hand painted glass cabochon moon. 

Chain is long but can be fastened anywhere along its length to suit.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Under the Sea Necklace
description:
A lovely big nod to the sea as this Tibetan Silver Octopus takes the seahorses and starfish under his tentacles.

The Seahorses have been hand painted and the starfish filled with pearlised paint and further detail can be seen in the second picture - including the detail on the back of the starfish.

Chain is a doubled length of silver plated chain.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: The Dragons Guard Necklace
description:
The big red eye and pair of dragons make a challenge for anyone wanting the break into the cage and take the treasure!

Crystals and stones inside the cage have all been reclaimed from broken jewellery and are sealed in with a disc of brass and the red in the eye has been handpainted by me with pearlised paint.

Chain is long but can be fastened anywhere along its length to suit.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Dreamcatcher Earrings
description:
As the sun comes out and the hair goes up here is a pair of Dreamcatcher Earrings with reclaimed drops with crystals in the middle and a little Swarovski sun drop at the bottom.
These earrings hang down about two inches and catch not only dreams but the sun as well.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Bell Flower Drop Earrings
description:
These earrings go lovely with A Victoria Heart Necklace and the Bee and Filigree Necklace but look equally lovely on their own.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: A Locket for Flowers Necklace
description:
I found this locket in my box of broken things and it looked sad, so I gave it some flowers under a little glass cabochon and a silver plate chain and now its happy again.

The locket is silver plated but with age and wear in its previous life some of this has worn off, so a proper little vintage number here!

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Recycled Victoriana Necklace
description:
Everything about this necklace is recycled, from the main body of the pendant, to the chain to the pink crystal at the bottom, this makes me happy!

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Just a Heartbeat Away Necklace
description:
Upcycled from an old necklace, the centre piece of this necklace is a large gold tone heart, I've added six red Swarovski crystals to finish it off.

This necklace can also be worn as a choker and the extra chains hang lovely over the collar bone.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Dragon Scale Chain Maille Necklace
description:
Hand crafted from anodised aluminium scales the chain is made to co-ordinate with the scales and is a sturdy but light box weave chain maille.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: The Heart of the Dragon Necklace
description:
At the heart of this piece is a reclaimed pink Topaz heart nestled in an upcycled flower flanked by two small dragons and held aloft by birds.

On the back of the flower is an old shell pendant from the box of broken things.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Owl Be Watching You Pendant
description:
This little owl likes yoo-hoo-hoo!

Made using an upcycled watch movement and decorated with Swarovski crystals, different colour combinations can be selected if you'd like different coloured eyes, these are made to order so may take a couple of days before I can post them.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch and pendant comes on a silver plated chain.

Apologies for the rather hurried picture but I couldn't wait to share :D

name: Time Flies - Lucky Dip
description:
My favourite design is that of the Times Flies (also one of my best sellers!) 

Simply made from a pair of wings bonded to an upcycled watch movement these pendants always stand out.

Size wise these pendants would sit inside of a 10p piece.

You will receive one similar to those pictured but if you have a preference please get in touch and I'll do everything I can.

Item price includes gift box or gift pouch

name: Clockception Pendant
description:
The watch within a watch within a watch Clockception was suggested by a friend.

Three progressively smaller watch face dials are stacked and topped off with a small crystal.

The chain is a long one but can be fixed at with the clasp along any of the links for different wearing options.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Oh I Do Like To Be Beside The Seaside Pendant
description:
The sea was my inspiration for this one, rock pools to be more precise, poking around to see what I could find...
Oops, was reminiscing then!

The vintage brass pocket watch movement plate has a little seahorse and starfish either side of what reminded me of a decorated ships wheel I made using the lid from a spring case and a large gear and finished off with Swarovski crystals.

The chain is a long one but can be fixed at with the clasp along any of the links for different wearing options.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Rainbow Winder Pendant
description:
From a vintage wristwatch with a kinetic winner came this winding piece and it said to me that it wanted to be a rainbow, how could I refuse!

I added an arc of rainbow Swarovski crystals and set it on a silver plated bail and chain.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: A Heart Needs Unlocking Pendant
description:
The vintage brass pocket watch plate holds the key to the heart.

Embellished with a few little Swarovski crystals and a reclaimed red gem, the acrylic red heart below is a lovely rich shade which reminds me of cherry sweets.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Two Little Lovebirds Pendant
description:
This vintage watch movement is feeling the love and you can see why, the two little lovebirds are nesting in a heart next to three ruby red Swarovski crystals.


The chain is a long one but can be fixed at with the clasp along any of the links for different wearing options.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Morning Chorus Pendant
description:
The sun is rising in a blue sky for one little birdy nesting on a vintage brass wristwatch plate.


The chain is a long one but can be fixed at with the clasp along any of the links for different wearing options.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Welcome to Lancashire Necklace.
description:
The brass plate used in this piece is from a broken antique pocket watch and is engraved Made In England, Lancashire Watch Co. Ltd (a company which ceased in the early 1900s)

With this in mind I added a red acrylic flower and red reclaimed gems, the little key charm is there to welcome you.

I refurbished the old chain and added it for a different look.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: A Simple Flower Pendant
description:
Simple and quite sweet, this little pendant has been made with an antique brass tone filigree flower, a Sekonda watch face and a Volcano coloured Swarovski crystal in the centre.

The Volcano colour goes through various shades of reds, oranges and purples depending on the angle you look at it.

The chain is a long one but can be fixed at with the clasp along any of the links for different wearing options.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Pretty Little Bits and Pieces Necklace
description:
Back to the box or broken things for this one, the main part was an earring but is now a lovely little pendant with added drops and gears.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Watch Part Explosion Bracelet
description:
This bracelet has been made in the style of a charm bracelet but instead of charms it is festooned with many little parts from various vintage watches.

There is also a matching necklace in the shop...

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: The Flower was Framed!! Necklace
description:
The flower was from my box of broken things and looked as though it was beyond reuse... But here at Minkys Emporium, nothing is truly beyond use so here it is!

Mounted in an antique brass toned cameo frame and centred with a Volcano Swarovski crystal this necklace can be worn at any length as the chain is long but the clasp fits nicely in any of the links.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Upcycled Elegance Necklace
description:
When the main part of this necklace was a brooch it had a old faux pearl heart in the centre, this pearl had lost its shine as the coating had worn away so I replaced it with four small bright red Swarovski crystals and a large mixed tone Swarovski none as Volcano type as the colours range through reds, oranges, blues and purples - see pictures for a couple of angles.

Everything else on this item is recycled from bits of old necklaces and has the option of being shorter choker style or a longer necklace.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Watch Part Explosion Necklace
description:
The picture and title speaks for itself with this little number!

Lots of little parts from inside various vintage watches have come together to form this necklace.

Matching bracelet also available.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Something Old, Something New Pendant
description:
Old meets new with this pendant with a nod to Victorian style and a former battery powered quartz watch movement.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Tubular Cube Ceramic Dial Pendant
description:
An oddity born from an experiment with wire.

All based on an antique (Victorian/Edwardian from what I could find out from the makers name!) ceramic on copper pocket watch dial.
Hanging from the middle is a mounted gem from an old bracelet and the little cube has a crystal on the four sides and is hanging from a coiled wire.

I would say there is a little touch of the shabby chic about it :)

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: A Steampunk Buggy Pendant
description:
This little creation has been made from a bridge part from a vintage pocket watch and several little gears and balance wheels.
The larger gear at the top has been riveted on and can be twiddled with :)
This is on a silver plated chain.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Thistle Dew Pendant
description:
Found in a box of broken things and given a Minkys refurb this vintage cut crystal pendant comes on a delicate twisted link 925 stamped sterling silver chain.

It's not perfect but it is lovely and looks great on.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Tweet Yourself Upcycled Brooch Pendant
description:
This gold tone little bird used to flit around a broken pearl and a couple of gaps but now it has three reclaimed faceted gemstones to ponder.
The pendant hangs from a delicate gold coloured chain.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Mystic Owl Bracelet
description:
This owl knows things! You can seen it in his eyes!

The eyes are yellow Swarovski crystals and the chain is extra long so will fit all wrists (or even some ankles!) and there's even a little owl on the end of the chain.

Other eye colours are available!

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

Made to order - please allow an extra day or two.

name: Green Cameo Necklace
description:
I do like cameos and this one makes new meet old.

The cameo itself is new and resin based but it is housed in a silver tone vintage brooch frame.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Time to Sparkle Necklace
description:
Keeping this one simple was the aim as the watch movement with its 15 tiny rubies and detail on winding gear was already quite lovely so I fixed a silver plated bail on the back and a few Swarovski crystals to the front.
The crystals are the Swarovski Volcano colour which means the colour varies from orange through to purple and really catches the light.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Retro Pendant Stuck in Time
description:
This is a bit of 70s style which was looking a little sad after it lost its glass stone but despite it being a little rough around the edges I couldn't see it cast aside, so with a small recycled watch movement and a bit of a tidy up its retro charm is back.
The pendant hangs quite long on its original chain.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Rose Cameo Necklace
description:
I found this little rose in my stash and decided it would be right at home in an antique bronze coloured cameo frame and here it is!

There will not be another of these!

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: She Sells Sea Shells (With a hint of Steampunk) Necklace
description:
This is mostly recycled, the large shell base and purple shell disc came from old necklaces and the gears I've collected from old watches. Topped off with a couple of purple Swarovski crystals this necklace is a true one off.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Brooch Bouquet Necklace No. 3
description:
A former brooch who's pin had broken but was too pretty to throw away is now a pendant on a silver plated chain.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Brooch Bouquet Necklace No. 2
description:
A former brooch who's pin had broken but was too pretty to throw away is now a pendant on a silver plated chain.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Brooch Bouquet Necklace No. 1
description:
A former brooch who's pin had broken but was too pretty to throw away is now a pendant on a silver plated chain.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: A Blue Hue Locket
description:
A little mixture of old and new, a new locket and chain with a flower on the front of the locket from an old earring and a collection of gears from old watches finished off with a couple of blue discs and silver rings.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Chain Maille Bracelet in Gold Plated and Antique Bronze
description:
Here is a chain maille bracelet hand made by me using gold plated and antique bronze tone jump rings.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

Made to order - please allow an extra day or two.

name: Butterfly Time
description:
A little vintage butterfly with double enamelled wings is hung underneath an ornate watch face set into a bronze tone filigree.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Springtime Fling
description:
A watch movement sits in this vintage pocket watch plate as a bee flits over a rose growing from its Swarovski crystal stem. The pendant has then been further embellished with vintage watch gears and a watch face.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Two Hearts
description:
This is a simple pendant made with a red acrylic heart tucked behind a pretty heart pendant I picked up somewhere!

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: A Travelling Companion
description:
Fly away and travel in style, this pendant is set on a vintage pocket watch base plate with a compass plane and globe which spins.
In the middle is made from a day face from an old watch set under glass cabouchon with a few Swarovski crystals for good measure.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Sweethearts Cameo
description:
A sweet little cameo in an antique bronze tone frame, she's got a couple of recycled bits and bobs with her and a coordinating key.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Valentine
description:
This little silver frame holds a vintage watch movement with Swarovski crystals.
Hanging from it are tokens of love from old pieces and a little wing to sweep you off your feet.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: High Flyer
description:
Something a little different and a total one off, the glass stone is in the style of an Opal and came from an old abandoned earring that was sad. It's been rehomed into a silver frame and given its wings which measure approx. 4cm each.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: A Drop of Purple
description:
The purple stone in this used to be part of a bracelet but is now set into an antique bronze tone frame with purple beads and shell discs dropping down like a little chandelier.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Cameo Elegance
description:
A reclaimed cameo set in a new frame with part of a salvaged earring go together just right to make this Victorian style pendant.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Mounted Time Flies Pendant
description:
A slight twist on my Time Flies range this pendant is a vintage watch movement mounted on a recycled earring with a pair of little wings.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Timeless Collection of Things
description:
The title of this one says it all! This charm style pendant has a little bit of most pretty things, large acrylic drop, pearl bead, watch face and lengths of chains all from old items.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: The Lovebirds
description:
A vintage enamelled copper pocket watch face is the new roost for these little lovebirds and if that is not enough love in one pendant then there is a wire heart underneath from an old necklace of mine.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Love Struck Cupids Time For Love
description:
It's that time of year again - the time for love and this little chap might come in handy! Fixed to front of this vintage and shiny watch movement is a little Cupid taking aim at a trio of Swarovski crystals in the shape of a heart.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Vintage Romantic
description:
The main body of this pendant used to be part of a broken pair of earrings and now it has a new purpose - As part of this one off elegant necklace.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Time Frame
description:
This little vintage watch movement is right at home in this antique bronze tone frame and and would be right at home in any jewellery collection.

Pendant is hanging from a delicate bronze colour chain but could be hung from a larger chain if required.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Sunny Side Up
description:
Are you missing that wonderful bright orb in the sky this slightly grim and chilly time of year? 
Now you can take the sun with you on this Watch Movement pendant, with bright Swarovski crystals to add a bit of sparkle.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Simply Charming
description:
This silver plated and chunky bracelet has been decked out with various charms most of which are recycled from old pendants or earrings and I have left ample space for any additional charms to be added.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Watching The Flowers Grow
description:
This is a simple but sweet pendant consisting of a vintage enamelled pocket watch face and recycled flower pendant hung from a gold tone bail on an antique bronze tone chain.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: The Key to Your Heart
description:
A romantic little pendant in plenty of time for Valentines day (or just because!) 

Set on this recycled watch plate is a lovely old watch face, red acrylic heart and bead and a vintage key.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: A Dutch Cameo
description:
This one off used to be a broken brooch but has now been reset into a bronze tone frame with some added shine of Swarovski crystals.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Victorian Inspired Flower & Bee Filigree Necklace
description:
This is a chunky but light necklace. 

It's centre piece is a bronze tone flower reclaimed from an old necklace with twirlable watch gears, bell flower and little bee.
All held together with filigree discs on an antique bronze tone chain.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.

name: Mini Key and Regulator Pendant
description:
This one off necklace has been made using a recycled regulator bar from a vintage pocket watch, this bar is ornately engraved and quite lovely.
To this I have added a small gear wheel and tiny blue gem.

Pendant is finished with a tiny key charm and is hanging from an antique bronze tone fine chain and hangs approx. 5cm.

Item price includes gift box or velvet pouch.
